data.title: Adrianne Curry & Christopher Knight Split on Anniversary!
data.meta_description: Many couples celebrate wedded bliss on their anniversary but not so for Adrianne Curry and Christopher Knight! On their five-year anniversary yesterday, the
data.text:
Many couples celebrate wedded bliss on their anniversary but not so for Adrianne Curry and Christopher Knight! On their five-year anniversary yesterday, the model/actress and Brady Bunch star officially called it quits.

OK! GALLERY: ADRIANNE CURRY'S BACK ON THE SCENE

Adrianne and Chris first met as housemates on The Surreal Life. Since romance bloomed, they quickly landed their own series, My Fair Brady which rolled cameras on their dating to engagement to first year of marriage.

OK! NEWS: ADRIANNE CURRY & CHRIS KNIGHT IN COUNSELING

Unfortunately, it looks like the next chapter of their life is my fair separation. Their long-time friend and manager Phil Viardo told Hollyscoop, â€œActor Christopher Knight and his wife, model and television star Adrianne Curry have announced today on their five-year wedding anniversary that they are separating."

OK! NEWS: CHRISTOPHER KNIGHT RESPONDS TO FLORENCE HENDERSON
